amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike title II of the bill that would limit judicial review of agency actions and prevent the awarding of attorney's fees under the Equal Access to Justice Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 114-301 to strike sections of the bill that would limit judicial review of agency actions and prevent the awarding of attorney's fees under the Equal Access to Justice Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cartwright amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 245 (Roll no. 562).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cartwright amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 245 (Roll no. 562).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Cartwright.
